app.title: Lunar Beauty Calendar
app.subtitle: Beauty advice based on moon phases

phaseExplanations.NEW: During the new moon, energy is directed inward. It's the ideal time for purification and new beginnings.
phaseExplanations.WAXING_CRESCENT: The waxing crescent brings growth and development energy. Perfect for nourishing and stimulating.
phaseExplanations.FIRST_QUARTER: The first quarter is a time of action and decisions. Energy is strong and dynamic.
phaseExplanations.WAXING_GIBBOUS: The waxing gibbous moon amplifies effects. It's the time of maximum power for treatments.
phaseExplanations.FULL: The full moon brings intense energy but can cause sensitivity. Ideal for relaxation and care.
phaseExplanations.WANING_GIBBOUS: The waning gibbous moon favors release and repair of damage.
phaseExplanations.LAST_QUARTER: The last quarter is perfect for eliminating what's no longer needed, like unwanted hair.
phaseExplanations.WANING_CRESCENT: The waning crescent concludes the cycle. It's time for deep cleaning and reset.

categoryOrder.howItWorksDescription: The app analyzes lunar phases and calculates the most auspicious moments for each beauty treatment. Select a category to see the next recommended dates.

descriptions.cut: Find the best times to cut your hair according to the lunar calendar
descriptions.color: Discover when to color your hair for optimal and lasting results
descriptions.wax: Identify ideal days for waxing and hair removal
descriptions.treat: Plan facial and body treatments during the most effective periods

explanation.cut: Cutting hair during certain lunar phases can influence hair growth and health. Waxing moon phases are traditionally considered favorable for stimulating stronger and faster growth.
explanation.color: Hair coloring benefits from specific lunar energies that can improve color absorption and result durability. The indicated phases favor better pigment uptake.
explanation.wax: Hair removal and waxing during certain lunar phases can be less painful with slower regrowth. The indicated times are traditionally associated with greater treatment effectiveness.
explanation.treat: Aesthetic treatments for face and body can benefit from lunar energies for better penetration of active ingredients and more lasting results. The indicated dates are the most auspicious for these treatments.
